sections.heading: Overview
content:
Amy Weber is one of the most beautiful and sought-after bikini models in the
business. Weber has appeared on "Melrose Place," "High Tides,"
and "The Young and the Restless." She has also acted in a number of
independent films, most recently "Art House," where she had a starring
role opposite MTV's Chris Hardwick.
